short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Arcana Wallet is a self-custody crypto wallet featuring Chain Abstraction

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Go multi-chain without the hassle of bridging.

Arcana Wallet gives you a unified balance of your USDC, USDT, ETH, and wETH across multiple chains. Spend the entire balance instantly in one click, on your chain of choice.

Key Features:

1. Easy Onboarding: Import your existing Wallet address or create a new one
2. Unified Balance: A single aggregated balance of your tokens across multiple chains
3. No More Bridging: Spend your entire USDC, USDT, ETH, and wETH across chains, without going to a bridge, directly from the wallet 
4. Instant Transactions: Spending assets from multiple chains is near instant. Transactions execute in 1-click, in under 20 seconds.
5. Pay Gas on Any Chain: Pay gas fees in USDT or USDC. No more hassle of holding native gas tokens for every chain. 

Supported Chains at launch are Ethereum, Base, Polygon, Arbitrum and Optimism.

Chain Abstraction Supported Apps include Uniswap, Aave, Polymarket, Hyperliquid, Jumper, and more coming soon. 

Visit our website for the latest list of apps and chains.

In addition to supporting apps with Chain Abstraction, the Arcana Wallet offers full web3 wallet functionalities. 
- Connect to any app across EVM chains
- Add or remove chains
- Automatically switch between chains
- On-ramp crypto from your debit/credit card
- Auto-detect balances across added chains
- Send and receive Crypto securely
